raw_body: peacefully passed away at her home on the 9th of January, in her 95th year, surrounded by family. She was the cherished wife of the late Charles E. Fonseka, a devoted mother to Sunil, Darshani, Sriyani, Nimal and Salini and a loved mother-in- law to the late Ranjit Fonseka and Ranjit Perera. Bertha was a beloved grandmother to Ranyani, Suren, Navin, Sriyanjit, Dilrukshi, Ransri, Adrian, Rajini and Melissa and an adored great-grandmother to 17 gre
